tool_description: Summarize any YouTube video in any language and get only the essential content delivered to your inbox.
name: Summandsend
title: Summandsend

api_list.name: video
api_list.description: This endpoint is specifically designed for video summarization and utilizes callbacks due to the time-consuming nature of video processing. To facilitate testing, you can easily set up a callback server using Google Colab. For detailed instructions, please refer to the provided tutorial for more information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://summandsend1.p.rapidapi.com/video"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "summandsend1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://summandsend1.p.rapidapi.com/video"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "summandsend1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
